btn.search.label: Search
input.search.title: Searchterm (minimum 2 chars)
label.searchhelp: Type one or more words - or part of a word. These must exits in a page (or title, description, keywords). Multiple searchterms will be connected with the given search method.
label.searchlang.title: Language
label.searchmode-and: strict: all searchterms are a must (AND)
label.searchmode-or: more results: minimum one of the searchterms must be found (OR)
label.searchmode-phrase: exact: several words as a phrase
searchout.too-many-hits: Remark: You get a lot of hits. You should add one more term for your search.
about.infostring: OpenSource search engine and website analytics
